entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
